channel.title: ConquestX V4 (It's Here!)
channel.description:
Hey guys! This is my 4th and last release of ConquestX with this source. I hope you enjoy. I did remove some of the items and model looks from V3 because it cause the game to have severe lag. I hope you guys like this one. my base was divine-Syndicate V2 60% credits to remco for creating an awesome base 40% me for Fixing lots of dupes,bugs,and model looks.
Things that need to be fixed:
Donators have Admin commands
Not sure on how to fix it.
Media : TYnxKNv.png
http://prntscr.com/3e3xeu
All the pictures in one
Download:
https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/68058824/Package.zip
Cache Auto Downloads
I DO NOT ALLOW ANYONE TO RE-RELEASE THIS ANYWHERE WITHOUT MY PERMISSION
#BLIZZHAR FAG
I'll Be adding more pictures soon

item.title: ConquestX V4 (It's Here!)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

That teleport tab looks like total crap. Why would you use an X (or close) sprite for anything besides a disabled/exit/close button/sprite? Plus the giant teleport sprite is too large, as it’s overlapping the text in the first teleport.
The donator tab is seen in basically any release ever, so it’s not worth showing off.

And not only that, you can’t even fix one of the simplest bugs…
if(rights >= rightsRequired && rights <= maxRights) {
Do command shit in here
}
^all you have to do (essentially) to fix your donators doing admin commands bug.

0.000000000000000000000000001/10.

Read full topic
